name: Deluxe Free Cell Solitaire
summary: Free Cell solitaire is one of the all time solitaire fan favorites. Unlike many solitaire games, free cell solitaire is a fun and challenging game that requires more strategy than luck. Deluxe Free Cell plays standard 52 card free cell solitaire. It's simple to play, but also includes lots of options and features that are sure to please the most serious free cell player. Deluxe Free Cell will take advantage of larger displays for clear and easy to read cards. It supports high definition resolutions up to a game window size of 1920x1080. It also includes a convenient toolbar, appearance options, numbered games, statistics tracking, records best times, secondary mouse support, undo, redo, and much more.
